WIC
Star

Windows Infection Components

For more info on the project, click on the logo.

If you want to contribute, check out our contribution guide. Our criteria list sets out what we define as a WIC. More information on programmatically accessing this project can be found on the API page.

If you are looking for Windows binaries, please visit lolbas.github.io.
If you are looking for UNIX binaries, please visit gtfobins.github.io.
If you are looking for drivers, please visit loldrivers.io.
